text: Liberty X are a British vocal pop-R&B; group. The band was formed in London in 2001 from contestants in the first series of Popstars. The band split in 2007. They reformed in 2012. The quintet's members are: Michelle Heaton (born 1980), Tony Lundon (born 1979), Kevin Simm (born 1980), Jessica Taylor (born 1980) and Kelli Young (born 1981). title: Liberty X
